==== Poster ====

===== Openexpo Winterthur 09 =====

A great suggestion by Iris Hariz:

* <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu_expowinterthur2009.pdf]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu_expowinterthur2009_2.pdf]]</nowiki> 
* <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu_expowinterthur2009_3.pdf]]</nowiki>

Both the flower in the first example and the bamboo in the second example are there to express the "karmic" part, in Iris' own words: "..just to add something oriental-ish..."

===== Openexpo Bern 09 =====

Again, a very nice poster suggestion by Iris Hariz:

* <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu_poster_Jaunty.pdf]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu_poster2_Jaunty.pdf]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu_poster3_Jaunty.pdf]]</nowiki>

We chose poster no 2 to display at the booth.
